Literature.Title: ARACINs, Brassicaceae-specific peptides exhibiting antifungal activities against necrotrophic pathogens in Arabidopsis.
Literature.Author: Neukermans J, Inzé A, Mathys J, De Coninck B, van de Cotte B, Cammue BP, Van Breusegem F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Alternaria brassicicola(IC50=5.46µg/ml),Botrytis cinerea B05-10(IC50=3.05µg/ml),Fusarium graminearum(IC50=28.17µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(IC50=6.41µg/ml),Sclerotinia sclerotiorum(IC50=0.73µg/ml)
